code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Drawer,DrawerBody,DrawerFooter,DrawerHeader,DrawerOverlay,DrawerContent,DrawerCloseButton,Button,Input,Radio,RadioGroup,Stack}from'@chakra-ui/react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function DrawerWithInputAndRadio(){const[isOpen,setIsOpen]=useState(false);const[textValue,setTextValue]=useState('');const[radioValue,setRadioValue]=useState('1');const handleOpen=()=>{setIsOpen(true);};const handleClose=()=>{setIsOpen(false);};const handleInputChange=event=>{setTextValue(event.target.value);};const handleRadioChange=value=>{setRadioValue(value);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{colorScheme:"teal",onClick:handleOpen,children:"Tone Changer"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Drawer,{isOpen:isOpen,placement:"right",onClose:handleClose,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DrawerOverlay,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(DrawerContent,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DrawerCloseButton,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DrawerHeader,{children:"Change the Tone"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(DrawerBody,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{placeholder:"Type here...",value:textValue,onChange:handleInputChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RadioGroup,{onChange:handleRadioChange,value:radioValue,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Stack,{direction:"row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Radio,{value:"professional",children:"Professional"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Radio,{value:"funny",children:"Funny"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Radio,{value:"emotional",children:"Emotional"})]})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(DrawerFooter,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"outline",mr:3,onClick:handleClose,children:"Cancel"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{colorScheme:"blue",onClick:handleClose,children:"Ask Query"})]})]})]})]});}export default DrawerWithInputAndRadio;
